attributes.action: Remove tolls on Southbound Dartford Crossing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Request to consider removing southbound tolls,double northbound toll charges and use the extra space created to increase the number of toll booths northbound.

This proposal would ease congestion on both sides of the crossing and continue to provide the necessary tunnel control.

This proposal also assumes the need for continuing collection of tolls.

This proposal will also dramatically reduce pollution,reduce fuel consumption and reduce journey times.
